name: RoboSnakes: Core Wars Legacy
description: An alien voice resonates within your head: IF.PROGRAM.ROBOSNAKE.SMART. KILL.ENEMY.AI.THEN.WIN.AGAINST.FRIENDS. SAVE.HUMANITY.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD 7870 2GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
